name: Baldi's April Fools School
description:
(NOTE: I know its not april fools, so don't attack me in the comments)

Ok basically, This mod is just like Evil Baldi's Basics 2. Except Alot harder, So if your gonna cheat, that won't count as your win. Just beat the mod without cheats. But if you win, lucky you. But anyway i may take a break from baldi modding now. so go play the mod I guess.

By the Way Thanks to Everyone who Supported the mod!
